string-array.name: migration
string-array.item: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS in_vehicle_devices
CREATE TABLE in_vehicle_devices ( $(id) INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , url TEXT NOT NULL , login TEXT NOT NULL , password TEXT NOT NULL , authentication_token TEXT )
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS vehicle_notifications

CREATE TABLE vehicle_notifications ( $(id) INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY , body TEXT NOT NULL , body_ruby TEXT , notification_kind INTEGER NOT NULL , read_at INTEGER , response INTEGER , schedule_downloaded INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS operation_schedules

CREATE TABLE operation_schedules ( $(id) INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY , arrival_estimate INTEGER , departure_estimate INTEGER , platform_id INTEGER NOT NULL , arrived_at INTEGER , departed_at INTEGER , complete_get_off INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 )
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS passenger_records

CREATE TABLE passenger_records ( $(id) INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY , get_on_time INTEGER , get_off_time INTEGER , reservation_id INTEGER NOT NULL , user_id INTEGER NOT NULL , ignore_get_on_miss INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 , ignore_get_off_miss INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 , local_version INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 , server_version INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 , representative INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 , passenger_count INTEGER NOT NULL )
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS operation_records

CREATE TABLE operation_records ( $(id) INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY , arrived_at INTEGER , departed_at INTEGER , operation_schedule_id INTEGER NOT NULL , local_version INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 , server_version INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 )
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS reservations

CREATE TABLE reservations ( $(id) INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY , memo TEXT NOT NULL , arrival_schedule_id INTEGER NOT NULL , departure_schedule_id INTEGER NOT NULL , user_id INTEGER NOT NULL /* 代表者ユーザー */ )
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS service_unit_status_logs

CREATE TABLE service_unit_status_logs ( $(id) INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY , latitude TEXT /* BigDecimal.toPlainString() */ , longitude TEXT /* BigDecimal.toPlainString() */ , orientation INTEGER , temperature INTEGER , signal_strength INTEGER , created_at INTEGER NOT NULL )
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS platforms

CREATE TABLE platforms ( $(id) INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY , address TEXT NOT NULL , memo TEXT NOT NULL , name TEXT NOT NULL , name_ruby TEXT NOT NULL , latitude TEXT NOT NULL /* BigDecimal.toPlainString() */ , longitude TEXT NOT NULL /* BigDecimal.toPlainString() */ )
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS users

CREATE TABLE users ( $(id) INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY , first_name TEXT NOT NULL , last_name TEXT NOT NULL , memo TEXT NOT NULL , handicapped INTEGER NOT NULL , needed_care INTEGER NOT NULL , wheelchair INTEGER NOT NULL , license_returned INTEGER NOT NULL default 0 )
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS service_providers
CREATE TABLE service_providers ( $(id) INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , name TEXT NOT NULL , log_access_key_id_aws TEXT , log_secret_access_key_aws TEXT )
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS default_charges
CREATE TABLE default_charges ( $(id) INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT , value INTEGER NOT NULL )
ALTER TABLE passenger_records ADD paid_charge INTEGER
